text: Aluminocopiapite is an aluminum iron sulfate mineral with the chemical formula AlFe(SO)(OH)·20HO. Its type localities are Fortymile River in Alaska and the San Rafael Swell in Utah.Aluminocopiapite on mindat.org Aluminocopiapite found in Spain == References == == External links == * Aluminocopiapite data sheet * Aluminocopiapite on the Handbook of Mineralogy Category:Aluminium minerals Category:Iron(III) minerals Category:Sulfate minerals
title: Aluminocopiapite
